Professional Website Designer
Ruben Gutierrez

Hello! My name is Ruben Gutierrez and I am a freelance website designer in La Habra, California nice to meet you. I've been working on computers since I was 10 and have been building out website for the past few years.

Let's Talk

How I Got Started In Website Design

My interest with technology started when I received my first computer for Christmas at ten years old. When I wasn't taking it apart and putting it back together I was researching new ways to try and make it work faster and more efficiently. Fast forward a couple years and I started working on my friends and families devices.

Now that I'm 30 I've focused my attention to website development and design. While building websites these last few years I've developed a lot of technology related skills, theirs diffrent ways to
